title: Cart Management System

acceptanceCriteria.description: Add to Cart Functionality: Users can successfully add items to cart from product pages with variant selection and real-time inventory checking
Item Removal System: Users can remove items from cart with confirmation dialogs and undo functionality
Quantity Management: Users can update item quantities with real-time validation, maximum limits, and bulk update capabilities
Product Variant Handling: System properly handles product variants with specific pricing, availability checking, and image handling
Validation System: Real-time availability checking, price validation, product restrictions handling, and comprehensive error handling
Bulk Operations: Multi-select functionality, select all operations, bulk removal/updates, and bulk move to wishlist
Cart Organization: Drag-and-drop reordering, cart grouping by category, custom organization options, and sorting features
Save for Later: Save items interface, saved items management, price drop notifications, and restore to cart functionality
Comparison Features: Item comparison interface, comparison criteria selection, side-by-side comparison views, and comparison sharing
Recommendations: Cart-based recommendation engine, upsell/cross-sell suggestions, frequently bought together items, and personalized recommendations

tasksCompleted: Cart data models and API implementation with variants and categories
Cart interface components with add to cart functionality
Real-time updates and inventory integration with WebSocket
Bulk operations and cart organization with multi-select
Save for later and comparison features
Performance optimization with caching and lazy loading

technicalNotes.architecture: Flutter/Dart with state management using ChangeNotifier
technicalNotes.performance: Optimized for large carts with caching and progressive loading
technicalNotes.realtime: WebSocket-based inventory updates with fallback mechanisms
technicalNotes.features: Complete cart management with bulk operations, comparisons, and recommendations
technicalNotes.integration: Seamless integration with cart persistence system (Story 2.1)

testRequirements.unitTests: Required for all product and cart management functions
testRequirements.integrationTests: Required for real-time inventory and cart synchronization
testRequirements.performanceTests: Required for bulk operations and large cart handling
